Package chh.util

A set of utility classes.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Computer
    Utility class containing commonly used fields and methods used in many programs.
    Number
    A utility class containing calculations on natural numbers (non-negative integers).
    Probability
    A utility class containing functions involving probability.
    Random
    A class with methods for generating random numbers.
    Statistics
    A utility class containing functions involving statistics.

Package chh.util Description

A set of utility classes. The classes in this package cannot be instantiated and contain only static fields and methods, used in normal mathematical calculations and random generations.
